website_summaries.verdict: This cooler is great for fishing, hiking or road-trips when you need just a few things cold and handy.
pros: Collapsible soft-sided cooler helps save space
Panel on top allows you to access food and drinks without having to open the whole lid
cons: Sometimes the cooler can leak melting ice
It also does not have a hard liner

customer_reviews.title: Good for transporting frozen breastmilk on a cross-country flight
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small cooler to transport about 30 oz of frozen breastmilk on a cross-country flight. I wanted the milk to stay frozen so I could pop it back in the freezer when I arrived. I packed this cooler with four small ice packs on the top, bottom, and sides, put the bags of frozen milk in the middle of the cooler, then packed the cooler in my checked bag. When I arrived at my final destination about 10 hours later, the milk was still frozen solid. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: megatron

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I tested this product immediately as it is to be used for backpacking. 22 cubes of ice didn’t last much more than an hour in direct sun at almost 80 F, however the melted water stayed cold till next morning. On the backpacking trip in the Mt. Hood Forest I used a freezer ice pack and threw in frozen sausages. Although thawed, the sausages stayed cold till the morning of the third day. During this time temp reached about 75F and the cooler was left in shade or backpack, rarely in the direct sun. While I cannot attest to its effectiveness in a harsher environment as of yet, i can say that it was great in the conditions mentioned above.
customer_reviews.author: Nwgal79

customer_reviews.title: Love it for everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have to take lunch meat and OJ everywhere I go, this is my second one ( I wore the first one out after a couple years) I just grab a couple of the hard freeze squares out of the camping section and keep in my freezer and in the morning I put in my stuff with my ice packs and it lasts all day! Zips great and holds the cold! I like the carry strap but I wish they would add a small to handle for a quick grab, but other than that you cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these Coleman soft (no hard liner) lunch bags. They are definitely more insulated than your average bag. I can fit 4 tupperware brand sandwich keepers perfectly (vertical) across the bottom. Then still have room for a freezer pack, snacks and if necessary a 5th sandwich in sandwich bag. This lunch bag is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Received in bad condition
customer_reviews.text: I just received this in the mail 15 min ago , first it was shoved, forced, into my mail box . The foam under the liner isn't right , the lunch box won't even sit upright . I bought this one because I wanted the same as I had before because it was the perfect size. The one on the left is the new one , the right is my old one . Will order replacement and hope it's better
customer_reviews.author: Mgreg

customer_reviews.title: Very trusty lunch box
customer_reviews.text: I've now owned two of these only because I destroyed my 1st one going four wheeling. It keeps my stuff very cold and you can feel how well insulated it is. It's also very durable as my 1st one lasted much longer than other lunch boxes. I mainly use it for work but I will strap it on an ATV and go so it handles abuse well. It has the right amount of small pouches or netting for me. Also when it gets dirty it's easy to wipe out but I normally will just wash it with the laundry as well. I also like how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Koepnick

customer_reviews.title: Best cooler ever made!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cooler I have ever bought! It is very sturdy and should last a very long time! All those I bought before (and they were many) either fell apart or their zippers broke. This is made so well that I don't think it can ever fall apart, and it has a great zipper! I cannot recommend this cooler enough!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bevi

customer_reviews.title: Works great for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Needed something that I could keep at work to throw a couple frozen things in when grocery shopping on my way home. This has decent enough insulation that the frozen stuff stays frozen for the drive from the store to my house, and it's just the right size for ice cream or one of those big bags of frozen berries. I've also sometimes used it for road trips to keep a couple beverages and a sandwich in, along with an ice pack, and it's been great for that, as well. Just the right size, and very good price.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this to carry medical equipment and meds around for my child. I separately purchased a “medical equipment inside” hard tag for the outside of it. It fits a blood pressure monitor, several large bottles of medication, pulse ox finger monitor and a few other small items. I can even manage to squeeze in a freezer pack for if I need to leave it in the car on hot days. The lid has a net pocket on the inside that I can keep a pen/pencil & paper for tracking numbers, etc. Perfect for what I need! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: A lot of a cooler bag for this price
customer_reviews.text: Compared to others st local stores you get a good product. Lots of room for lunch boxes, drink and ice pack. Well lined, easy to clean. Has two zippered areas and small pouches on sides. Have used it on many day trips As far as longevity of your ice it’s comparable to others. It’s not a expensive and Nice looking. Good carry strap. I’d Purchase again any day
customer_reviews.author: I G

customer_reviews.title: !!!!! NOT !!!!!!! 24 hour
customer_reviews.text: Do not believe the 24 hour ice thing. We tested it twice. We bought 60 of these things for our employees. Luckily none of them are going to need it for 24 hours. They only work 10 hour shifts. We will see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Windsor

customer_reviews.title: I didn't receive the cooler in the picture. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't receive the cooler in the picture. I was going to return or exchange, but I would have had to pay for the shipping so I decided to keep it. It's a bit small on the inside as well, so it will not work for my lunches. Keeping for kayaking and beach trips.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Manguno

customer_reviews.title: size is not as described
customer_reviews.text: nice "little" cooler, listed as a nine can cooler , 6 is the most you will get in there and that doesnt leave much room for ice.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Have never tested it beyond about 6 hours - but ...
customer_reviews.text: Have never tested it beyond about 6 hours - but in a hot car in summer - with an added 'ice mat' inside - my water bottles were every bit as cold (I think colder) as when I put them in.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: ... plus three disposable ice packs to keep my Dupixent cool on the 27 hour travel door to door from ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this plus three disposable ice packs to keep my Dupixent cool on the 27 hour travel door to door from DC to Taiwan. It worked great. Yes, it's larger than travel packs but due to the length of the travel I needed the extra ice packs and insulation from Taiwan heat. When I arrived at the hotel the bottom ice pack was still partially frozen even.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler for the price
customer_reviews.text: I use this cooler to keep several drinks cold for a day out. It has great insulation that will keep items cold during the hottest days. The cooler is made very well and holds up to hard usage. I have had other coolers in this price range for the same purpose that did not hold up nearly as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rich P

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler but leaks
customer_reviews.text: i used this cooler to transport breast milk on a flight and while on vacation. It worked great at keeping everything cool, easy to carry, etc. However, my ice melted and leaked out of the cooler making everything around wet, wish it was waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Boris P.

customer_reviews.title: Not up to par...
customer_reviews.text: The description is 9 cans? Not sure what type of 9 cans would fit, so that’s a bit of an exaggeration. Also, with ice added, it barely kept things cold for 12 hours. It is not well insulated. It’s about the size of a small lunch pail, without a had strap, only had a shoulder strap. I have seen better designed units. Will probably throw away.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff G.

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: This is too small to be of any use. They claim it holds 9 cans. Tuna cans? Cans that have been emptied and crushed? I guess if you tried hard enough and streched to the fabric to the point of tearing, you could possibly put 9 cans in, but then there's the ice to keep the cans cool. Where do you find room for that? Save your time. Shop for something other than Coleman. Many complaints on Amazon about Coleman coolers being smaller than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: clarence johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great but not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Great size. I put 6 cans of soda and the rest ice. Went to the beach for 5 hours and yes I had some ice left over but more than 70% or so had melted but the water was real cold, which kept the sodas great. The same thing when hiking in Big Bear. I like it and use this cooler often.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Lunch box with shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.text: Now that I’m going back to work as the virus threat is somewhat calming , I take my own lunch rather than eat in cafeteria. This bag has enough room for small storage containers and blue ice. I also appreciate the shoulder strap.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Good for keeping injectable medications cool
customer_reviews.text: Good for keeping injectable medications cool. We used it during our summer vacation in southern Europe at +40C. It holds cool temperatures for more than 24 hours. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Economical Choice
customer_reviews.text: The cooler is great size but I don't its sturdy enough for caring cans which may cause its durability to suffer if used on a regular basis. However, the price makes the cooler a good economical choice.
customer_reviews.author: Tyzuki

customer_reviews.title: kind of snug
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cooler bag. It does keep stuff cold. I was just surprised and how snug it was. I'm not certain it would squeeze in all the cans it is supposedly able to carry. It does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Wong

customer_reviews.title: and it would have been awesome if it would have an inside plastic that would ...
customer_reviews.text: the zipper gets stuck on the inside material... and it would have been awesome if it would have an inside plastic that would have hardened it and made it more leak proof
customer_reviews.author: Libellula

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for lunch
customer_reviews.text: This little cooler is perfect for a little something to eat for lunch. It'll hold a sandwich and bottle of water and maybe a few cookies. Just right for me!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: description not correct
customer_reviews.text: To test I put 4 bottles if frozen water. Left at midnight. By 8am it was melted. There was no bottom board for steadiness.. description said 24 hour cold and it didn't produce that for me. Unfortunately it was already you so I could not return it
customer_reviews.author: Alysa Rose

customer_reviews.title: Ehh
customer_reviews.text: They keep things cold but it leaks as soon as I move it around. Doesn't leak if its upright but just the slightest shift in any direction and it'll leak until I place it upright again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 6 cans fit No way yiu can get 9 in this cooler
customer_reviews.text: Lol more like 6 can cooler and only has plastic lining so stays cold for 2-4 hours
customer_reviews.author: John k

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it cool...
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is amazing! My husband bought it for me when I went back to work after giving birth to our daughter. I use it to transport breastmilk from home/work to the hospital for her and it holds ALOT of breastmilk and keeps it cool or frozen as needed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Herron

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler, it's perfect for a day out and fits around 5-6 drinks with a cooler pack. It's lightweight and well made, definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Floridagurl

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Awful purchase, extremely disappointed. I put ice in it, literally 15 minutes later it was completely melted. I expected a little more out of this! Also leaks profusely when liquid is inside (such as my melted ice)
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Kirkbride

customer_reviews.title: The product is just fine for the purpose
customer_reviews.text: THe product is good, seems sturdy , I don't know yet how well it works so it's not easy to write a review, but I think it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Coleman Cooler was a disappointment!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Coleman cooler barely kept our soft drinks cool. The cooler was always in a air conditioned vehicle on our trip. I had 3 completely frozen ice packs in the cooler with 1 bottle of frigerated cold pop for about 4 hours & it was never out in the sun. I was very disappointed that my soda was warmer then when i put it in the cooler. I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but a little smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but a little smaller than I expected. I'm assuming I over estimated the true size of 9 cans. I've gotten larger for an equivalent price but not too big of a deal. This one will probably last longer though. If you're hoping to pack your husband's lunch in it then I would go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things cold!
customer_reviews.text: I carry my lunch to work every day. It still amazes me how cold it is when I take it out of this little cooler. It is lightweight but very reliable. Love this one so much, I bought two sizes up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: So far this is a good sturdy bag. It doesn’t keep things as cold for as long as I’d like but it will suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J Clark

customer_reviews.title: Lasted two days
customer_reviews.text: It lasted two days before it started leaking. I do not like the design anyway. I tried to call Coleman so called Customer Service. Rep. could not speak English. DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jeffrey S. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Small but well made.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike is the size. Wish it was a little bigger
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Z

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sitting on the balcony
customer_reviews.text: I use this cooler when I go up to my balcony or out to the beach. Works great for storing water, pop, or beer. Add an ice pack or 2 and you are set for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Chaplain Grill Sergeant

customer_reviews.title: Very Small
customer_reviews.text: It is very small. Smaller then then advertised. I can hardly fit a standard bottle in of water in it. And forget fitting more then one bottle of water in it.
customer_reviews.author: ADB

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold the cold in for very long. But enough for things to stay cool for lunch. Ice will melt with in 4 hours
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Not so Cool!
customer_reviews.text: Great size, but didn't keep cold as long as stated. Husband is farmer and needs all day ice and cool. Nope, didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy B

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice as the Polar Bear little cooler but less than half the price and does a good job when you just need to pack a lunch or take a few ( or 9) drinks to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: DJB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for lunches and short outings
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for lunches and short outings. I use in my car and carry lunch as well as snacks and keeping water cold for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes this lunch bag,it does what it claims. Would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cooler! Holds ice all night - great for a bring your own lunch guy -
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: keeps items cold
customer_reviews.text: thank you for your prompt delivery, keeps beverages cold and easy to use, multiple pockets for extra items
customer_reviews.author: William Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Cooler bag
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and keep my bait frozen for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: LOYD DINNEEN

customer_reviews.title: Style and affordability
customer_reviews.text: For the money it is the best cooler bag ever. The shoulder strap makes it so easy to carry into work.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra J. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Impractical Cooler
customer_reviews.text: The interior liner has folds that would be hard to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Good lrice
customer_reviews.text: Not a 24 cooler but works well for a soft cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Beach

customer_reviews.title: I am really glad that I didn’t pay full price for this item
customer_reviews.text: I am really glad that I didn’t pay full price for this item. I purchased this because it stated will not leak. Well guess what it leaks. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it looks.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a perfectly adequate cooler. Keeps my lunch cold-ish in my car if I have two or three ice packs in it. Smaller than it seems.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny!

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product and he keep the water cold between 4 to 5 hour
customer_reviews.author: mishal ayed

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: I have used it 2 times and it works great for me, Thank you
customer_reviews.author: kelly craft

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. This one will keep things cold.
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if will last 24 hours, but this soft side cooler has thicker insulation than any I've seen. It's exactly what I was looking for. It should keep our picnic lunch cold for the long hikes with my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Miller

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable and well mde
customer_reviews.text: The only negative thing is that the outside pocket has no zipper. Things fall out. salt pepper etc.
customer_reviews.author: Larry P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Used it to hold numerous beers so I didn't have to keep standing in line at Jazz Fest.
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be a pompous yeti. Buy this cooler for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Arthrell

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t keep things as cold as I expected
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t keep things as cold as I expected. Small, reusable ice packs are melted after about 8 hours. Bottled water is cool, but bot refrigerator cold. Maybe I had unrealistic expectations. It’s made well and serves it’s purpose
customer_reviews.author: Linda L

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for daycare to keep my child’s food cold during the day. The ice packs are still frozen when I pick her up from the nanny. So from 5am-8pm it stays cold! I can’t attest for any longer length of time!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The cooler is perfect for my husband to take to the golf course.
customer_reviews.author: Vee Ann Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lunch box
customer_reviews.text: Excellent lunch box. Keeps everything cool if you freeze it overnight or put an ice pack in it, even when your job requires you to drive around all day like mine does. Coleman is a name you can trust.
customer_reviews.author: Katie P

customer_reviews.title: too small waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I am donating it as it is totally useless for an adult
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: A good size for average office lunch
customer_reviews.text: A good size for average office lunch. With a cool pack added keeps items cold all day. So no matter when you break for lunch. Sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.author: Chris-AC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't keep cool for 24 hours with the ice packs I'm using. (The 4 pack it suggested)
customer_reviews.author: Jo_rauf

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, falling apart after 6 uses.
customer_reviews.text: The size and performance are great but it has split at the seam as shown after 6 uses. My husband uses it when he plays golf. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps things cooler longer than any other lunchbox sized soft shell carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew David Thimmig

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Kept cold for the several hours I needed it to. Capacity was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: Coleman mini cooler
customer_reviews.text: Our dog chewed up this Coleman cooler. So we had to replace it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep cold for 24hrs
customer_reviews.text: Does not keep things cold for 24 hours. I’d say it keeps them cold as much as a regular lunch box. I would not recommend. It’s not a yeti or a RTIC.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley S. Bluth

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag but way too small
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I was disappointed with the size of this cooler. It says 9 cans but I could barely fit 6 small juice/water bottles for my son's field trip. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: The ice does not hold up for 24 hours be ...
customer_reviews.text: The ice does not hold up for 24 hours be lucky if they hold up 12 hours. But it does not leak yet.
customer_reviews.author: jimmyq15

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler, well made but much smaller than I
customer_reviews.text: It is very small, it says 9 cans; 9 cans - no ice. Nice cooler, well made but much smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.author: kurt w

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. Will fit a six pack of cans and plenty of ice no problem. No leaks whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: 6 pack maybee
customer_reviews.text: this should not be sold as a 9 can, well made but will only hold a 6 pack and ice won't last 8 hrs
customer_reviews.author: Rick Vassallo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a light lunch for 2
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a light lunch for 2, holds cans and regular water bottles easily. Kept things chilled for nearly 2 hours in the Florida sun!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Toft

customer_reviews.title: Lunch and a snack fit well.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my adult son. He is beyond happy! He can put his lunch and two water bottles and a snack in with cooler packs. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to carry my lunch in every day and to put it simply it is "TOO SMALL"! Also the inner lining seems to want to catch in the zipper and over time I can see that it would tear. The bag was received in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: G. M.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use it as a lunch box. It’s ok and keeps stuff cold for a while.
customer_reviews.author: The Nobles Family

customer_reviews.title: small cooler
customer_reviews.text: This was just what we needed. Perfect size. I already rated this item!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie D

customer_reviews.title: 9 cans, no chance
customer_reviews.text: Only way you can get nine cans in there is if you don't plan on cold drinks. 6 can max if you want ice in there.
customer_reviews.author: COACH J

customer_reviews.title: It's a zip up cooler...
customer_reviews.text: It definitely doesn't keep anything cold for 24 hours. I filled this halfway with ice and icepacks and put a sandwich, a water bottle, and a bottle of Gatorade in there and it was all warm and melted after 4 hours. It was 90 degrees outside, but I don't feel this is a good enough reason for all of my ice to be melted after such a short time and for my stuff to also be warm. It also leaks, since it's kept closed by a zip. I've had it spill on me multiple times and it gets aggravating. It works well enough at 70-80 degrees, so that's why I gave it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler bag! I bought it for my teenage son who uses it for his lunch bag for school.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Diekmann

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: If 9 cans of soda fit in this, I would like to know how. Returning item.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Solid lunch bag purchased for my fiance for his lunches ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid lunch bag purchased for my fiance for his lunches on the road during the day. More bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice, I like the quality, is exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: John Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Durable outer material and thick insulation really keeps contents cold

customer_reviews.title: I like it, keeps food cold for a long time
customer_reviews.text: I like it, keeps food cold for a long time,
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Its a perfect size for 1-2 persons to take to the beach ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a perfect size for 1-2 persons to take to the beach with only 1-2 persons. However the ice packs take up a lot of space,
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Take me to the event.
customer_reviews.text: Was not as big as I wanted. But it did the job.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just right size for carrying in car on longer trips and keeps beverages cold for long time
customer_reviews.author: TRS

customer_reviews.title: ... things cold for 24 hours but it does an good enough job for 9 hours
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely won't keep things cold for 24 hours but it does an good enough job for 9 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Fast and great delivery time.
customer_reviews.text: Got the product very fast and happy with the product. Excited to get my money's worth this summer at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: More of a really nice 6 pack and sandwich/snack holder
customer_reviews.text: Will fit 9 cans without ice. More of a really nice 6 pack and sandwich/snack holder. Good quality and for the price would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 24 hrs is a dream
customer_reviews.text: Have not put ice in it yet, plus doesn't work well with gel pak
customer_reviews.author: Ricky D

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time on a camping trip last week. The zipper and or back seam was malfunctioned and the entire top detached.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected, 9 cans will fit if you jam them in there with zero room for freeze pack.
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: It keeps stuff cold!
customer_reviews.text: Hey what can I say, you put cold stuff in and it keeps it cold.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

product_meta.title: Coleman Soft Cooler Bag, 9 Can Insulated Lunch Cooler with Adjustable Shoulder Straps,Great for Picnics, BBQs,Camping,Tailgating & Outdoor Activities
product_meta.description: Keep food and drinks cold all day at the beach or on the trail when you bring the Coleman 9-Can 24-Hour Soft Cooler Bag. The zippered main compartment has heat-welded seams to seal in the cold and prevent leaks. No matter where you go or what extras you bring, an adjustable shoulder strap makes it easy to carry.
feature_bullets: PREMIUM INSULATION: Keeps ice up to 24 hours in temperatures as high as 90°F
STORAGE OPTIONS: Zippered main compartment; Front pocket for dry storage and accessories
ODOR-RESISTANT LINER: Treated with antimicrobials to resist odor, mold, and fungus
CUSTOMIZED FIT: Shoulder straps are adjustable for maximum comfort

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
